description: Verification Order required to confirm the internal numbering and description of the mixed-use development comprising basement, lower ground and ground floor plus 7 storeys comprising Use Class D1 Nursery and Specialist Treatment Centre at ground and lower ground level, and 31 residential units, linked to Planning application PP/19/06712, as follows:2A Lucan Place SW3 (Ground and Lower Ground Floors) - (Nursery)2B Lucan Place SW3 (Lower Ground Floor) - (Specialist Treatment Centre)(Commercial Units share a separate communal access and post point)Flat 1, First Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 2, First Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 3, First Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 4, First Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 5, First Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 6, First Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 7, Second Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 8, Second Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 9, Second Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 10, Second Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 11, Second Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 12, Second Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 13, Third Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 14, Third Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 15, Third Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 16, Third Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 17, Third Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 18, Third Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 19, Fourth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 20, Fourth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 21, Fourth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 22, Fourth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 23, Fourth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 24, Fourth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 25, Fifth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 26, Fifth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 27, Fifth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 28, Sixth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 29, Sixth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Flat 30, Sixth Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3Penthouse Flat, Seventh Floor, 2 Lucan Place SW3(Residential Units share a separate communal access and post point)
